title: Token balance not fetched when on Mobile network
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

When login to account under mobile network, even the 'Use mobile data' option is enabled, - all token balances are not shown (shown as `...`). `Scan tokens` and pull-to-refresh in wallet account doesn't help. However, re-enabling `Use mobile data` in the same session makes `Scan tokens` option work again.


#### Expected behavior

Tokens appear after using 'Scan tokens' when Mobile network is set on device. 

#### Actual behavior

![scna_smaller](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8749671/105490962-410f5e80-5cbe-11eb-8c43-177824abdfaa.gif)


### Reproduction

- Switch device to Mobile network
- Open Status
- Recover account with assets
- On the Chats view there is `No Wi-Fi message syncing disabled. Settings` label. Tap 'Settings' (Or, open `Profile` -> `Sync setting` -> `Mobile data`).
- Toggle `Use mobile data` option in to 'ON' state and un-toggle 'Ask me when on mobile network' so the choice is remembered
- Close Status
- Open and login to account
_(So at this point we logged in with 'Use mobile setting' option in ON state)_
- Navigate to main Wallet view
**Actual result** All token balances are empty (displayed with `...`) since we under mobile network
**Expected result:** All tokens are shown with balance
- At the top-right tap `...` -> `Scan tokens` option
**Actual result:** No tokens fetched.
**Expected result:** All tokens with > 0 balance value fetched and displayed (with balance) on main Wallet view
- Turn on WiFi on your device
- Once WiFi connected scan tokens again (top-right tap `...` -> `Scan tokens`)
**Actual result:** Still no tokens fetched.
**Expected result:** All tokens with > 0 balance value fetched and displayed (with balance) on main Wallet view



### Additional Information
- Status version: release 1.10.1
- Operating System: Android and iOS

#### Logs

```
01-22 14:03:36.218 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :chats-list/load-success
01-22 14:03:36.257 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.transport.filters.core:262] - loading filters
01-22 14:03:36.269 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :status-im.wallet.core/update-token-balance-fail
01-22 14:03:36.275 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.wallet.core:60] - Unable to get tokens balances:  {:code -32000, :message "wallet service is not initialized"}
01-22 14:03:36.284 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :transport.callback/node-info-fetched
01-22 14:03:36.292 16857 16941 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:44] - Handling re-frame event:  :pairing.callback/get-our-installations-success
01-22 14
```
Full logcat with Debug:
